page.title: 14 TOURSIM
page.content: Sark depends on Tourism for its income and employment. Every year,on average,60,000 people visit the Island,either for the day or for longer holidays. There are 5 hotels,11 guest houses,18 self-catering apartments and 2 camp sites.There are also around 7 cafes.A tourist office was completed this year and opened on 1st April. On Sark you can follow one of the set walks,take a ride on a horse and carriage,hire a bicycle,visit one of the five beaches,sample some Sark cream or butter or try some fresh lobster or crab. One can visit the Seigneurie gardens and with permission go to the top of the tower to see the view.Another good view can be seen from the top of the mill which is now used as a sweet shop.
